items.name: var BNNSArithmeticAdd: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise sum of its two inputs.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticSubtract: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise difference of its two inputs.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticDivide: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise division of its two inputs.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticDivideNoNaN: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise division of its two inputs and returns zero if the divisor is zero, even if the first input is NaN or infinity.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticMultiply: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise product of its two inputs.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticMultiplyNoNaN: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise product of its two inputs and returns zero, even if the first input is NaN or infinity.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticPow: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise first input raised to the power of its second input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticMaximum: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise maximum of its two inputs.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticMinimum: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise minimum of its two inputs.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticMultiplyAdd: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise fused multiply-add of its three inputs.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticSelect: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that selects elements from either its second or third input based on the corresponding value of its first input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticExp: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise result of e raised to the power of its input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticExp2: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise result of 2 raised to the power of its input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticLog: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise natural logarithm of its input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticLog2: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise base 2 logarithm of its input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticAcos: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise inverse cosine of its input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticAcosh: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise inverse hyperbolic cosine of its input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticAsin: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise inverse sine of its input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticAsinh: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise inverse hyperbolic sine of its input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticAtan: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise inverse tangent of its input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticAtanh: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise inverse hyperbolic tangent of its input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticCos: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise cosine of its input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticCosh: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise hyperbolic cosine of its input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticSin: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise sine of its input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticSinh: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise hyperbolic sine of its input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticTan: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise tangent of its input.

items.name: var BNNSArithmeticTanh: BNNSArithmeticFunction
items.desc: An operation that calculates the element-wise hyperbolic tangent of its input.
